name: Uranium Waste
description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in a Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-Fissile Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

name: Plutonium Waste
description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in a Nuclear Power Plant.
Must be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

name: Concrete
description:
Used for building.
Good for stable Foundations.

name: Silica
description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, in advanced refinement processes, and for alternative production of electronics.

name: Iron Plate
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Steel Beam
description: Primarily used when constructing slightly more advanced buildings.

name: Aluminum Ingot
description:
Smelted from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

name: Battery
description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and vehicles.

name: Packaged Fuel
description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

name: Packaged Ionized Fuel
description: Ionized Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

name: Packaged Rocket Fuel
description: Rocket Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

name: Packaged Turbofuel
description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

name: Iodine-Infused Filter
description: Absorbs radioactive particles when used with the Hazmat Suit.

name: Compacted Coal
description: A much more efficient alternative to Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles and Coal-Powered Generators.

name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.

name: Petroleum Coke
description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient Coal replacement.

name: Packaged Oil
description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.

name: Iron Rod
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Wire
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Cable
description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build Power Lines.

name: Iron Ingot
description: Used for crafting the most basic parts.

name: Reinforced Iron Plate
description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

name: Rotor
description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

name: Fuel
description: Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

name: Rocket Fuel
description:
A high-impulse compressed gas fuel.
Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

name: Copper Sheet
description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for Pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

name: Modular Frame
description:
Used for crafting.
A multipurpose building block.

name: Screw
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Nitric Acid
description: Produced when Nitrogen Gas reacts with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

name: Turbofuel
description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles.

name: Empty Fluid Tank
description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

name: Crystal Oscillator
description: An electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

name: Motor
description: Creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

name: Dark Matter Crystal
description:
Concentrated Dark Matter Residue that is isolated within a crystalline vessel. This form of containment allows for utilising Dark Matter reliably in other production processes.

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

name: Ionized Fuel
description:
Fuel that has been ionized, allowing it to deliver incredible output.
Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

name: Supercomputer
description: The next-gen version of a Computer.

name: Cooling System
description: Keeps advanced parts and buildings from exceeding efficient temperature levels.

name: Ficsite Trigon
description: The Ficsite Trigon, made from Ficsite Ingots, is perfectly shaped for all construction challenges. It's performance is so exceptional, it basically solved structural engineering.

name: Turbo Motor
description: A more complex and powerful version of the regular Motor.

name: Time Crystal
description: Time Crystals are Diamonds that have been reconfigured on a sub-atomic level in the Converter to retain a time-periodic self-organizing structure. This allows them to be used in the development of quantum processing and storage technologies.

name: Dark Matter Residue
description:
Produced as a by-product of Quantum Encoding processes and alternatively generated in the Converter.

Various fields of science are still debating the nature and properties of Dark Matter. Meanwhile, FICSIT has found several applications for it in space-time manipulation.

name: Reanimated SAM
description:
The active and contained form of the Strange Alien Matter.

Proper electromagnetic containment is required, as it appears to be able to manipulate the atomic bonds of any matter it comes into contact with.

name: Excited Photonic Matter
description:
Excited Photonic Matter is essential for all production processes in the Quantum Encoder.

Formed in the Converter by inducing intense photon interactions through exposure to SAM in a high-energy environment.

name: Diamonds
description:
Synthetic Diamonds produced by exposing Coal to extreme heat and pressure.

Used in the production of Time Crystals and Dark Matter Crystals.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).

name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
description: Used to make products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength. Thin, lightweight, and highly durable.

name: Superposition Oscillator
description: An oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create a string vibration with a precise frequency. Often used in teleportation technology and dimensional manipulation.

name: Neural-Quantum Processor
description: The Neural-Quantum Processor utilizes a combination of neural network architecture and quantum computing techniques to achieve unprecedented performance. This technology has enabled some of FICSIT's biggest advancements in artificial intelligence and relativistic engineering.

name: AI Expansion Server
description:
Project Part #12. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 1500-2500 MW (2000 MW average).

Growth is the metric by which we measure success.

name: Magnetic Field Generator
description:
Project Part #7. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce a powerful and easily expandable magnetic field.

name: SAM Fluctuator
description:
The SAM Fluctuator is able to regulate and direct the behaviour of Reanimated SAM through the application of electric charges with varying frequencies.
This control facilitates technologies such as matter-to-energy conversion and spatiotemporal matter manipulation.

name: Steel Pipe
description: Primarily used when constructing slightly more advanced buildings.

name: Fused Modular Frame
description: A corrosion-resistant, nitride-hardened, highly-robust-yet-lightweight modular frame.

name: Radio Control Unit
description: Enhances and directs radio signals.

name: Ficsite Ingot
description:
Produced by reconstructing other metals on a molecular level using Strange Alien Matter.

Synthesized by FICSIT to be the perfect construction material, and used in the most high-end processes.

name: Biochemical Sculptor
description:
Project Part #10. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Years ahead of the competition, this top-of-the-line 3D printer is used for the production of synthetic biological resources.

name: Assembly Director System
description:
Project Part #6. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

name: Caterium Ingot
description: Smelted from Caterium Ore. Primarily used for advanced electronics.

name: Empty Canister
description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

name: Circuit Board
description: Advanced electronics that have a plethora of different uses.

name: Plastic
description: Versatile and easy to manufacture, this material has a wide range of uses.

name: Encased Industrial Beam
description:
Simultaneously utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and the tensile strength of steel.
Mostly used as a stable base for constructing buildings.

name: Rubber
description: A very flexible material that has a lot of friction.

name: Polymer Resin
description: A by-product of Crude Oil refinement into Fuel. Commonly used to manufacture Plastic and Rubber.

name: Heavy Oil Residue
description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

name: Quartz Crystal
description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

name: Steel Ingot
description: Smelted from a combination of Iron Ore and Coal. Can be made into several parts used in building construction.

name: Versatile Framework
description: Project Part #2. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Packaged Water
description: Water, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Copper Ingot
description: Used for crafting the most basic parts.

name: Aluminum Scrap
description: Refined from Alumina. Can be smelted into Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

name: Aluminum Casing
description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

name: Alumina Solution
description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

name: Computer
description: A complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behavior in other machines.

name: Heavy Modular Frame
description: A more robust multipurpose frame.

name: Smart Plating
description: Project Part #1. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: High-Speed Connector
description: Connects multiple cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern, so it has many varied applications.

name: Automated Wiring
description: Project Part #3. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Stator
description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

name: AI Limiter
description: Controls AIs and keeps them from evolving in malicious ways. Super advanced electronics.

name: Quickwire
description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion make it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

name: Modular Engine
description: Project Part #4. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Adaptive Control Unit
description: Project Part #5. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Pressure Conversion Cube
description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

name: Encased Plutonium Cell
description:
Plutonium Pellets encased in concrete.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Plutonium Pellet
description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Non-Fissile Uranium
description:
The Uranium-238 isotope is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be converted into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

name: Sulfuric Acid
description: Produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

name: Copper Powder
description:
Ground-up Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, makes this part perfect for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

name: Heat Sink
description: Used to dissipate heat faster.

name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
description: Regulates power output via electromagnetism.

name: Nuclear Pasta
description:
Project Part #9. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

name: Encased Uranium Cell
description:
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production. Made from Uranium Ore.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

name: Dissolved Silica
description:
Silica dissolved in Water, produced as part of the alternative refinement of Raw Quartz.
The Silica can be extracted from the Water to complete the refinement process.

name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
description:
Project Part #8. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high-pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

name: Black Powder
description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

name: Ficsonium
description:
Usage and production of this material is strictly prohibited. On Earth, that is. There are no rules in space, only efficiency. 

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

name: Singularity Cell
description: Used to break down space and time. Required to power Portals.

name: Ballistic Warp Drive
description:
Project Part #11. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 1000-2000 MW (1500 MW average).

A large amount of force is required for the Warp Drives to activate, so sticking them to rockets was the logical next step. Additionally, results improved immensely when the observers were further removed from the Warp Drives upon activation.

name: Gas Filter
description: Filters out toxins and pollutants from the air when used with a Gas Mask.

name: Alien Protein
description:
Ground-up Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.

name: Blue Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating an unknown weak power.

name: Alien DNA Capsule
description:
Translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetic information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and pioneers with Coupons.

name: Mercer Sphere
description: A weird alien phenomenon. While the sphere appears liquid, it behaves like a solid and does not have any detectable mass. It seems to somehow interact with and have awareness of its environment.

name: Purple Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a powerful unknown power.

name: Yellow Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating an unknown power.

name: Smokeless Powder
description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

name: FICSMAS Wonder Star
description: This special FICSMAS Star signifies FICSIT's productivity all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.

name: FICSMAS Ornament Bundle
description: All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!

name: FICSMAS Decoration
description: A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.

name: Candy Cane
description:
A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. 
*Disclaimer: Not for consumption...

name: Actual Snow
description: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind, though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

name: FICSMAS Bow
description: A fancy Bow. Maybe someone could wear this? You certainly can't! What you can do is make parts and decorations from it. Probably.

name: Copper FICSMAS Ornament
description: Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: Iron FICSMAS Ornament
description: A super special- Nope! Still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: FICSMAS Tree Branch
description: A special Tree Branch used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.

name: Red FICSMAS Ornament
description: Used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: Blue FICSMAS Ornament
description: Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

name: FICSMAS Gift
description:
Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!

name: Uranium Fuel Rod
description:
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
description:
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

name: Ficsonium Fuel Rod
description:
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.
The power source that put FICSIT on the map. Literally. The crater is still there.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Explosive Rebar
description: Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

name: Stun Rebar
description:
Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun Duration: 5 seconds

name: Homing Rifle Ammo
description:
The bullet guidance system built into this ammunition allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

name: Cluster Nobelisk
description: Detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical for clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.

name: Nobelisk
description: A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.

name: Gas Nobelisk
description: Creates a deadly gas cloud instead of a regular explosion.

name: Nuke Nobelisk
description:
Uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.
WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.

name: Pulse Nobelisk
description: Generates a powerful shockwave instead of a regular explosion.

name: Sweet Fireworks
description: Merry FICSMAS and a Happy New Year!

name: Fancy Fireworks
description: Fireworks are produced from random ingredients. Primarily used for having a good time.

name: Sparkly Fireworks
description: Goes Pfffeeeeew... BOOM! *Sparkle*

name: Snowball
description: Compressed dihydrogen monoxide crystals.

name: Iron Rebar
description: Can be shot using the Rebar Gun for self-defense purposes.

name: Portable Miner
description:
Automatically extracts a resource when placed on a resource node.
Note: Has limited storage space.

name: Shatter Rebar
description: Fractures when shot, launching deadly debris with wide spread but limited range.

name: Turbo Rifle Ammo
description: Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and rate of fire at the cost of accuracy.

name: Rifle Ammo
description: Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.

name: Iron Ore
description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

name: Coal
description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & Coal-Powered Generators, or in Steel production.

name: Water
description: It's water.

name: Nitrogen Gas
description: Has a variety of uses, including metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On MASSAGE-2 (AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

name: Sulfur
description: Primarily used to produce Black Powder.

name: SAM
description: Strange Alien Matter, commonly referred to as SAM, doesn't seem to follow the known laws of physics. It whispers of new possibilities.

name: Bauxite
description: Used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

name: Caterium Ore
description: Smelted into Caterium Ingots, which are primarily used for advanced electronics.

name: Copper Ore
description:
Used for crafting.
A basic resource primarily used for electricity.

name: Raw Quartz
description: Can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

name: Limestone
description:
Used for crafting.
A basic resource primarily used for stable Foundations.

name: Uranium
description:
A radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

name: Crude Oil
description: Refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

name: Solid Biofuel
description: The most energy-efficient form of solid Biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

name: Biomass
description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

name: Leaves
description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Leaves for power.

name: Mycelia
description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can also use Mycelia for power.

name: Wood
description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Wood for power.

name: Liquid Biofuel
description: Liquid Biofuel can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles.

name: Packaged Alumina Solution
description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Nitric Acid
description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Fabric
description:
Used to craft equipment.
Flexible but durable fabric.

name: Hog Remains
description:
The carapace of an alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

name: Spitter Remains
description:
The remains of a plasma-spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

name: Stinger Remains
description:
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.

name: Hatcher Remains
description:
The shell-like remains of an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

name: Power Shard
description:
Power Slug mucus compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

name: Somersloop
description: An odd alien object with a mind-bending, yet somehow familiar shape. It emits an unsettling energy.

name: Alien Power Matrix
description:
This intricate condensed-matter matrix is used to enhance the output of the Alien Power Augmenter. 

Initially developed in efforts to create a human-made Somersloop, the Alien Power Matrix cannot sustain the extra-dimensional energy connection on its own. However, it can effectively stabilize the energy stream of the Somersloop.

name: Drone
description:
Transports available input back and forth between its home Port and destination Ports. Drone Status and other details can be viewed at a Drone's home Port.
Must be built on a Drone Port.

Has 9 inventory slots.

Can use any fuel type.
Refuels at any of its connected Ports if possible.

name: Freight Car
description:
Attaches to an Electric Locomotive or other Freight Car to transport resources. Must be built on a Railway.
Resources are loaded and unloaded at Freight Platforms.
Has a 1600 m³ or 32-slot capacity, depending on whether resources are liquid or solid.

name: Electric Locomotive
description:
Moves Freight Cars from station to station.
Requires between 25-110 MW of power to move. 
Must be built on a Railway.

Nicknamed 'Leif' by FICSIT pioneers because of its reliability.

name: Truck
description:
Picks up and delivers resources at Truck Stations. This process can be automated. Nicknamed 'The Unit' by FICSIT pioneers because of its massive frame.

Has 48 inventory slots and a built-in Crafting Bench.

Fuel: Any fuel type

name: Tractor
description:
Picks up and delivers resources at Truck Stations. This process can be automated. Nicknamed 'Sugarcube' by FICSIT pioneers with the justification “It’s pretty sweet, y’know”.

Has 25 inventory slots and a built-in Crafting Bench.

Fuel: Any fuel type

name: Explorer
description:
Traverses rough terrain, including near-vertical surfaces. A fast and nimble exploration vehicle.

Has 12 inventory slots and a built-in Crafting Bench.

Fuel: Any fuel type
